channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - March 5, 2021
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-march-5-2021) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars_ * _Against the Dark Conspiracy_ * _ALIEN_ * _Bite Marks_ * _Escape From Dino Island_ * _Free from the Yoke_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Hit the Nazi: Retrieve the Ark_ * _Monster of the Week_ * _Monster Squad_ * _MoonPunk_ * _Naked City Blues_ * _Return to Brindlewood Bay_ * _Swords of the Serpentine_ * _The Veil: Inheritance_ * _Trophy Gold_ * _Vultures_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - March 5, 2021
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars
  • Against the Dark Conspiracy
  • ALIEN
  • Bite Marks
  • Escape From Dino Island
  • Free from the Yoke
  • Hearts of Wulin
  • Hit the Nazi: Retrieve the Ark
  • Monster of the Week
  • Monster Squad
  • MoonPunk
  • Naked City Blues
  • Return to Brindlewood Bay
  • Swords of the Serpentine
  • The Veil: Inheritance
  • Trophy Gold
  • Vultures

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
